buffs.name: Surprise Attack
buffs.description: [Surprise Attack] can activate even if the Crimson Hawk Rider is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%, Max 60%).

buffs.name: Airship VIP
buffs.description: The maximum value of [Airship VIP] can be increased up to 30%.

buffs.name: Revival Team for Spirit Rest Runs
buffs.description: When included in a team, medal buff increases by 70% (from 30% to 100%).

buffs.name: Enhance active skill
buffs.description: [Enhance active skill] applies even if when Warbear rider is in the Time Shop. (5-star 20 stages, 6-star 40 stages, Max 1000 stages).

buffs.name: Human Token
buffs.description: The human tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by human unit seals.

buffs.name: Elf Token
buffs.description: The elf tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by elf unit seals.

buffs.name: Undead Token
buffs.description: The undead tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by undead unit seals.

buffs.name: Darkness Resistance
buffs.description: Increases darkness resistance to 75 for each 5-star Crow Knight, and 150 for each 6-star Crow Knight. Also increases max darkness resistance through Crown Knights from 2,000 to 4,000.

buffs.name: Orc Token
buffs.description: The orc tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by orc unit seals.

buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
buffs.description: Tribe Friendliness for Human can be increased up to 600 by Winged Knight.

buffs.name: Wings of Zephyrus
buffs.description: [Wings of Zephyrus] is activated even if Winged Knight is in Time Shop (5-star 0.02, 6-star 0.04, Max 1.2).

buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
buffs.description: Tribe Friendliness for Elf can be increased up to 600 by Windwalker.

buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
buffs.description: Tribe Friendliness for Undead can be increased up to 600 by Abyss Mage.

buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
buffs.description: Tribe Friendliness for Orc can be increased up to 600 by Siren.

buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Human and Orc)
buffs.description: [Tribe Fortification] is applied even when Cleric is in Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for human units.

buffs.name: Innervate 2
buffs.description: Increases the maximum value of [Innervate 2] to 50%. Thus, reducing skill cool time (Outland Battle) by up to 50%.

buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Elf and Human)
buffs.description: [Tribe Fortification] is applied even when Elementalist is in Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for elf units.

buffs.name: Nature Resistance
buffs.description: Increases nature resistance to 75 for each 5-star Elementalist, and 150 nature resistance for each 6-star Elementalist. Also increases max nature resistance through Elementalists from 2,000 to 4,000.

buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Undead and Elf)
buffs.description: [Tribe Fortification] is applied even when Dark Elf is in Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for undead units.

buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Orc and Undead)
buffs.description: [Tribe Fortification] is applied even when Frost Demon is in the Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for orc units.

buffs.name: Enhance Active Skill
buffs.description: [Enhance active skill] applies even if when Frost Demon is in the Time Shop. (5-star 10 stages, 6-star 20 stages, Max 480 stages).

buffs.name: Fire Resistance
buffs.description: Increases fire resistance to 75 for each Flame Spirit, and 150 for each Senior Flame Spirit. Also increases max fire resistance through Flame Spirits from 2,000 to 4,000.

buffs.name: Elf's Secret Skill 2
buffs.description: [Elf's Secret Skill 2] is applied even if Hippogriff is in Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%).

buffs.name: Legend of Ancient Forest
buffs.description: [Legend of Ancient Forest] is applied even if Hippogriff is in Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 50%).

buffs.name: Limit Break of Spirit Rest
buffs.description: The maximum value of Spirit Rest increases by 2.5%, increasing maximum efficiency up to 12.5% (The maximum efficiency of current Spirit Rest increases from 10% to 12.5%. In addition, when Blade Master is awakened, the maximum efficiency increases from 12.5% to 15%).

buffs.name: Limit Break of Spirit Rest
buffs.description: The maximum value of Spirit Rest increases by 2.5%, increasing maximum efficiency up to 12.5% (The maximum efficiency of current Spirit Rest increases from 10% to 12.5%. In addition, when Dark Spirit is awakened, the maximum efficiency increases from 12.5 to 15%).

additional_buffs.description: [Hero Sword] Strengthen skills: Every 5 star Valkyrie raises attack power by 5% and every 6 star Valkyrie raises attack power by 10% with [Hero Sword]. (Effective even if Valkyrie is at the Time Shop and can increase up to 100%. [Hero Sword]: Skill that increases ally unit's attack power for a certain amount of time during raid)

additional_buffs.name: None
additional_buffs.description: [Fast Sword] Strengthen skills: Every 5 star Sword Dancer raises attack speed by 5% and every 6 star Sword Dancer raises attack speed by 10% with [Fast Sword]. (Effective even if Sword Dancer is at the Time Shop and can increase up to 100%. [Fast Sword]: Skill that increases ally unit's attack speed for a certain amount of time during raid.)

additional_buffs.name: None
additional_buffs.description: [Fast Shoes] Strengthen skills: Every 5 star Ice Spirit raises movement speed by 5% and every 6 star Ice Spirit raises movement speed by 10% with [Fast Shoes]. (Effective even if Ice Spirit is at the Time Shop and can increase up to 100%.) [Fast Shoes]: Skill that increases ally unit's movement speed for a certain amount of time during raid.)

buffs.name: Inner Passion
buffs.description: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 5 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop).

additional_buffs.name: Inner Passion limit break
additional_buffs.description: Inner passion max increases by 5 per Senior Steam Punk. (However, this value cannot exceed 50).

buffs.name: Inner Passion
buffs.description: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 5 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop).

additional_buffs.name: Inner Passion limit break
additional_buffs.description: Inner passion max increases by 5 per Senior Sylphid. (However, this value cannot exceed 50).

buffs.name: Inner Passion
buffs.description: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 5 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop).

additional_buffs.name: Inner Passion limit break
additional_buffs.description: Inner passion max increases by 5 per Senior Medusa. (However, this value cannot exceed 50).

buffs.name: Inner Passion
buffs.description: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 5 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop).

additional_buffs.name: Inner Passion limit break
additional_buffs.description: Inner passion max increases by 5 per Senior Naga. (However, this value cannot exceed 50).

buffs.name: Spirit Awakening
buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases by 10 for all units. ([Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop).

additional_buffs.name: Spirit Awakening Limit Break
additional_buffs.description: Max value of Spirit Awakening increases by 5 each per Senior Pilot. (However, this value cannot exceed 25).

buffs.name: Spirit Awakening
buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases by 10 for all units. ([Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop).

additional_buffs.name: Spirit Awakening Limit Break
additional_buffs.description: Max value of Spirit Awakening increases by 5 for each Senior Alchemist. (However, this value cannot exceed 25).

buffs.name: Spirit Awakening
buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases by 10 for all units. ([Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop).

additional_buffs.name: Spirit Awakening Limit Break
additional_buffs.description: Spirit awakening max increases by 5 per Senior Lich. (However, this value cannot exceed 25).

buffs.name: Spirit Awakening
buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases by 10 for all units. ([Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop).

additional_buffs.name: Spirit Awakening Limit Break
additional_buffs.description: Spirit awakening max increases by 5 per Senior Wyvern Rider. (However, this value cannot exceed 25).

additional_buffs.name: Offline March
additional_buffs.description: Raise [offline march] buff by 300%, and even if Griffin Rider is in the Time Shop, the offline march buff increases. (5-Star 10%, 6-Star 30%, Max 1000%).

additional_buffs.name: Offline March
additional_buffs.description: Raise [offline march] buff by 300%, and even if Forest Guardian is in the Time Shop, the offline march buff increases. (5-Star 10%, 6-Star 30%, Max 1000%).

additional_buffs.name: Offline March
additional_buffs.description: Raise [offline march] buff by 300%, and even if Succubus is in the Time Shop, the offline march buff increases. (5-Star 10%, 6-Star 30%, Max 1000%).

additional_buffs.name: Enhance Active Skill
additional_buffs.description: [Enhance active skill] applies even if when Sorcerer is in the Time Shop (5-star 15 stages, 6-star 30 stages, Default +200 stages, Max 900 stages).

buffs.name: Human's Secret Skill
buffs.description: Even if Aladdin is at the Time Shop, this has an increased chance to get 10x gold (Basic 10%, 5-star 2%, 6-star 5%) when using human secret skills.

additional_buffs.name: Golden Treasure Chests
additional_buffs.description: Automatically opens golden treasure chests containing gold at a certain percentage (Basic 10%, 5-star 2%, 6-star 5%).

buffs.name: Revival Team for spirit rest runs.
buffs.description: When included in a team, medal buff increases by 30% (from 10% to 40%).

additional_buffs.name: Time Shop Medal Bonus Limit Break
additional_buffs.description: Max medal buff increases by transcend units in Time Shop (Every 5-star Battle Drummer increases by 10% and 6-star increases by 20%. => For example, when there are seven 5-star and ten 6-star Battle Drummers, the max medal buff of transcend units in Time Shop increases from 1,000% to 1,270%).

buffs.name: God's Blessing
buffs.description: Even if the Priest is in the Time Shop, there is a chance for the 5 times speed buff starts every 10th floor (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%). Even when passing 10 floors with elves' Secret Skill (from 9th to 11th), there is a chance for the 5 times speed buff to start.

additional_buffs.name: Elf's Secret Skill 1
additional_buffs.description: [Elf's Secret Skill 1] can still activate even if Fairy is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%).

buffs.name: Elevates the first Stage after the Revival
buffs.description: [Elevates the first stage after revival] can still activate even if Dark Archer is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%%, Max 60%).

additional_buffs.name: Undead Secret Skill
additional_buffs.description: Increases chance of [Undeadâ€™s secret skill] even if Dark Archer is in the Time Shop. (6-star 1%, Max 30%).
